channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: From Concept To Reality: Mastering The Development Life Cycle Of Healthcare Software
item.description: In this article, I break the development life cycle into actionable stages, providing insights into creating robust, impactful healthcare software.

item.title: How ASPM Can Be The Missing Link In Application Security
item.description: Successful implementation of ASPM depends on more than just technology.

item.description: I can only begin to imagine where AI will be a year from now.
